comments.body: Please provide better documentation as without the npm package doesnt have source url and we wont be able to verify if you are writing correct definiton
@sheetalkamat Hi. Thanks. I'm not sure what do you mean. There is correct reference to react-virtual-keyboard npm package. What is wrong? Do I need to add READ.me ?

What I meant is that npm package link doesnt have enough information to see if you are declaring correct types. It points to github.com/gaearon/react-hot-boilerplate as source and that seems to be incorrect?
@sheetalkamat I'll write to react-virtual-keyboard authors. They have to change it.
